Microengine Package¶

Submodules

Clamav Microengine¶

class microengine.clamav.ClamavMicroengine(client, testing=0, scanner=None, chains={'home'})¶

Bases: polyswarmclient.microengine.Microengine

Microengine which scans samples through clamd

class microengine.clamav.ClamavScanner¶

Bases: polyswarmclient.scanner.Scanner

scan(guid, content, chain)¶

Scan an artifact with ClamAV

Parameters:
  • guid (str) – GUID of the bounty under analysis, use to track artifacts in the same bounty
  • content (bytes) – Content of the artifact to be scan
  • chain (str) – Chain we are operating on
Returns:

Tuple of bit, verdict, metadata

bit (bool): Whether to include this artifact in the assertion or not verdict (bool): Whether this artifact is malicious or not metadata (str): Optional metadata about this artifact
Return type:

(bool, bool, str)

Eicar Microengine¶

class microengine.eicar.EicarMicroengine(client, testing=0, scanner=None, chains={'home'})¶

Bases: polyswarmclient.microengine.Microengine

Microengine which tests for the EICAR test file

scan(guid, content, chain)¶

Scan an artifact searching for the EICAR string

Parameters:
  • guid (str) – GUID of the bounty under analysis, use to track artifacts in the same bounty
  • content (bytes) – Content of the artifact to be scan
  • chain (str) – Chain sample is being sent from
Returns:

Tuple of bit, verdict, metadata

bit (bool): Whether to include this artifact in the assertion or not verdict (bool): Whether this artifact is malicious or not metadata (str): Optional metadata about this artifact
Return type:

(bool, bool, str)
